text: Ferrid Kheder, born August 3 1975 is a retired French judoka and mixed martial artist. A professional MMA competitor from 1995 until 2013. He won 3 European Championships medals 2000-2002 and the European junior title in 1995. 3 European Championships medals 2000-2002. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:French mixed martial artists Category:French judoka
title: Ferrid Kheder
